Review Text: Thank you for the hospitality. The check-in and check-out process was excellent, especially the assistance by Abrar during check-in. Room service was slightly slow but manageable. The bed size felt small. Food taste and variety were overall satisfactory; however, there are limited options for vegetarians and vegans—please consider adding Jain food options as well.

The staff welcomed us with warmth and professionalism, Haidar ensured our check-in was seamless.
One of the standout moments of our stay was the exceptional service we received in the club lounge. Teddy went above and beyond to ensure my family was perfectly accommodated, personally showing us different room options to suit our needs. Working alongside Teddy, Kristine, the ladies made us feel truly special. Thank You 😊 
If you are looking for a luxurious and stress free experience, be sure to book the club lounge. It was a truly wonderful stay.

Review Title: A Perfect Blend of Elegance, Convenience, and Warm Hospitality
Review Text: This luxury hotel offers spacious, beautifully furnished rooms that provide exceptional comfort. Conveniently located near major sightseeing spots, it’s easy to get around by taxi—especially recommended from May onwards due to the city’s heat and 50% humidity. The hotel restaurant serves a diverse buffet for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, featuring local, Asian, and European cuisines. Throughout the stay, employees—from concierge to security—were exceptionally friendly and helpful, enhancing the overall welcoming and comfortable experience.

I went to the spa for Moroccan bath and Thai massage ,Sangita was one of the best she did the best massage and the bath! She was super kind and taking care of me very delicately! I will surely come here again, recommend everyone to come try it out!!

Everything was amazing, biggest thank you for Wassana Sangita and Marwan for their excellent extraordinary performances and service, it truly was amazing experience which i will definitely will come back again, the traditional thai massage with Hammam felt so luxuriously good, i will recommend this place to everyone who wants deep massage for muscles and bones.
